language.progressPopup: Most universities require an official C1 Language certificate from one of the following institutes: Goethe, DSH, TestDAF, and TELC . We will support you in the process.
language.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete it?
language.certificateDateDesc: Adding a certificate will help with your application to university.

transcriptOfRecords.descriptionSupport: Great, you already have a lot of verified courses! If you are applying for university you can request a PDF with a list of your achievements. Please contact {{orgDisplayName}} support

fileUpload.description:
Click here or drop files to upload your certificate.
(You can also upload your certificate later)
fileUpload.exampleDesc: Please click on the image to see an example of a certificate in a new tab

shortProgram.notFoundDesc: This module does not exist or does not belong to your study track. Please return to your study overview to view a list of all modules available to you.
shortProgram.certificateStart: Start this program today to get access to all of the units

shortProgram.noCertificateFinishText: You’re on your way! <1/>Keep up the pace!

courseraProgress.title: Coursera Progress
courseraProgress.subtitle: Why isn't my Coursera progress updated on {{orgDisplayName}} Campus?
courseraProgress.body: It can take 2-3 days before your Coursera progress shows up on {{orgDisplayName}} Campus. This doesn't mean your progress isn't being tracked. Please check back soon to see your updated progress!

pendingApplicationStatus.pendingExplanation: The screening process usually takes around 2 weeks.
pendingApplicationStatus.infoMessage: You need approval to enroll in this program

unitPage.completionInfo: Your instructor will mark this course as completed after review
